notice.ch: 與RS5012合班上課，空資組必修

remark.ch: 與RS5012合班上課，空資組必修

goal.ch: 經由講授衛星測量之原理及應用實際資料使學生了解衛星運動、訊號處理、定位過程、誤差分析，並熟稔相關酬載的測量精度與使用時機，同時具備資料收集、處理、驗證、應用等獨立操作能力。探討大地測量、重力測量、全球導航定位系統的觀測方法與精度，並介紹資料後處理與平差計算。
goal.en: "Introducing principle of satellite measurement from both lecture and hands-on practice. The lecture includes orbital mechanics, signal processing, positioning/navigation, and error analysis. The hands-on practice includes data collection, processing, validation, and application. This course covers satellite geodesy, gravimetric geodesy, and global navigation system, followed by data post-processing and adjustment computation."

outline.ch: 本課程包含原理介紹與資料實作。詳細講授內容包括衛星測高、重力測量、全球導航系統等衛星架構與測量方法，並將其觀測資料應用於地球物理、海平面與重力異常偵測。透過實作與理論並行，處理即時資料、統計分析、平差計算並連結科學應用。
outline.en: "This course includes lecture and hands-on practice. The material specifying satellite operation and measurement covers satellite altimetry, gravity field, and Global Navigation Satellite System. The data collected are applied to geophysics, sea level, and gravity anomaly detection. Data processing, analysis, and adjustment computation are included in hands-on practice with a connection to scientific applications."

textbook.ch:
1. Kalua, W. (1960). Theory of Satellite Geodesy, Dover, ISBN: 0486414655.
2. Leick, A. (2004). GPS satellite surveying. John Wiley & Sons.
3. Seeber, G. (1993). Satellite Geodesy, de Gruyter, Berlin-New York.
4. Torge, W. (1989). Gravimetry, W. deGruyter, Berlin
5. 授課教師準備的講義"
textbook.en:
1. Kalua, W. (1960). Theory of Satellite Geodesy, Dover, ISBN: 0486414655.
2. Leick, A. (2004). GPS satellite surveying. John Wiley & Sons.
3. Seeber, G. (1993). Satellite Geodesy, de Gruyter, Berlin-New York.
4. Torge, W. (1989). Gravimetry, W. deGruyter, Berlin
5. Lecture notes by instructor"

gradMethod.ch:
"實習與作業: 20%
課堂測驗: 60%
期末報告: 20%"
gradMethod.en:
"Hands-on practice and assignment: 20%
Quiz: 60%
Final project: 20%"

ch.competencies: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development
